agayum[sanskaranaya] yojithaya 2015 si rishthe sammana priyathama beti sammanaya drashti dhami dinagathi[16] priyathama naya sadasya (pirimi) siddhanth karnik wasare priyathama paurushathwaya anita raj priyathama bahu drashti dhami nirdeshitha[16] priyathama pathi-pathni rishtha siddhanth karnik saha drashti dhami priyathama beta siddhanth karnik priyathama sas-bahu anita raj saha drashti dhami priyathama sauthan jayana tida priyathama busurg surekha sikri priyathama kutumbh sujoyi wadhwa 2016 si rishthe sammana hondama runathmaka charithaya (kantha) surekha sikri[17][18] indiyanu rupawahini akadami sammana runathmaka charithayaka hondama niliya surekha sikri dinagathi[19][20] 2017 si rishthe sammana priyathama beti' eesha sin priyathama bahu eesha sin nirdeshitha[20] priyathama beta sarthaj gil priyathama busurg anita raj priyathama khalnayak ikbal khan priyathama kirdar (pirimi) sarthaj gil priyathama kirdar (gahanu) eesha sin priyathama jodi sarthaj gil saha eesha sin priyathama dharawahik (prabandhaya) sfiyar orijins pakisthanaya thula mema kathamalawa jiyo kakashkowani nalikawen wikashaya we.
